website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S 4 is the ultimate kitchen-sink smartphone with features you'll still be discovering months after you buy it. It's our top Android pick on Verizon.
pros: Relatively small for its display size
cons: Low-light camera performance could be better

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Phone on the market hands on!
customer_reviews.text: The best phone on the market today! I started out with the Galaxy Fascinate, then moved up to the S3, and now the S4. I have to say I'm very pleased with this phone in every way. This blows away the iPhone by miles, which my wife and son both had until recently. They were so glad to move over to Android and Samsung phones! You will be too. There are endless apps for about anything you can think of, the phone is easy to navigate, the screen is gorgeous and a nice size, the feel of it in your had is perfect, it's fast and has great speaker! This one will make anyone happy! Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: obsolete
customer_reviews.text: the phone seemed to work fine until the Verizon people saw it then they insisted it was "obsolete!" and selling a newer overpriced model
customer_reviews.author: ozarkdoc

customer_reviews.title: The Best Smartphone, but needs Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: This phone is fabulous--a huge improvement over my Droid X. App launcher works perfectly, screen is big and bright, endless options for customization. Apps are lightning fast, integration with Google features is perfect. Camera is the BEST, challenges my array of Nikon and Canon pocket cameras for quality. The phone is very light weight and a bit delicate--I damaged it a bit the first time I dropped it, but was able to repair it myself. I added a $20 Body Glove case, which makes the phone at least as rugged as my Droid X, but also as heavy or heavier than the Droid X.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Luke

customer_reviews.title: Seller state phone in good condition, No!
customer_reviews.text: As it is a 2nd hand phone I expect normal usage issues. The phone arrive with all the prior owner data still on it, thus this phone was never inspected and properly reset. Phone have a crack on the side, see photo. Phone screen have a severe Samsung Logo burned into it. Bettery is old, expected at least that to be new. I will not recomend this seller to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Faulty display that cracks for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Its sad that i had to give this one star because the phone as a whole performs great however, recently a large internal LCD crack randomly appeared on my phone. I did not drop it or misuse it. There has been a case and a screen protector on the device since the day i bought it. I don't know if Amazon is sending out faulty products or what, but this is unbelievable. Again, the outside screen is perfectly fine no cracks or scratches but the inside LCD randomly cracked. I'm going to contact amazon about this, but so far it looks like i was sold a faulty device that may not be under warranty because they will claim physical damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Cericola

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this phone for all its features. Sure, the iPhone is neat, but I like have and android as a phone and an Apple for my tablet. It keeps me current on both technologies, and Samsung really has a grasp on the cool side of Androids. I wouldn't trade my Galaxy S4 for any other phone on the market. Perfect size, good battery life, tons of available accessories and awesome display. Who could ask for anything more?
customer_reviews.author: Kojika55

customer_reviews.title: OMFG
customer_reviews.text: That's really all I can say about this phone. I love it, I can even overlook Samsung's UI that I find aesthetically displeasing for the fact that everything just flows so well. I haven't owned a Galaxy phone since the Captivate back in 2010 and this felt like reuniting with an old friend... who happened to have a huge boil on his nose, but and old friend nonetheless! Seriously, if you're in the market for a powerful device that (with proper care) will keep kicking ass throughout your 2 year contract, this is it. The Air Gestures thing is kinda wonky though, gimmicky actually. Not deducting points because everything else is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorCubicle

customer_reviews.title: Killer.....
customer_reviews.text: I have read, reseached and tried to fine a reason not to try this phone BUT no reason was good enough or even came close to giving me a reason. This phone has been nickname the 'iPhone killer' for GOOD reason. Samsung IS what apple was a few years ago da bomb! All the feature(s) of a iphone plus more, more, more. It's a must-have in today's technology driven market....a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Troy J. Gaillard

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've had many android devices, but never a Samsung. The S4 blows both my Evos out of the water in every imaginable category *EXCEPT* the fact that Samsung has installed a bunch of garbage apps and also manages the phone's automatic updates. I don't have a problem with getting updates, but I do have a problem getting OTA updates that cost me data. HTC at least gave me the option to only download updates over wifi similar to when there's an update for an app in the Play Store. The rest of the phone's features are outstanding. The screen quality is unmatched, the call quality is terrific, and the phone's size is super slim.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Phone and Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my wife and one for myself. They have lots of neat apps and they will do a whole lot more than I'll ever ask a phone to do. If you're like me and don't want a lot of apps running simultaneously, they are easy to turn off. The VZ Navigator has served me well on numerous occasions. As always, I'd like longer lasting battery but these seem to outlast the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty complex...but good
customer_reviews.text: Liking this phone...many other reviewers offer terrific detail in their reviews re: capabilities, so no need for me to echo here. Just want to add that I did many hours of research comparing different models and am quite happy with what I chose so far. I'm not a huge tech person, but have had smart phones before, so have some basis for comparison. We're at the 2 month mark, so I'm keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Not so portable when it's plugged in all the time
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great to deal with but the phone is crap. I wish I read all the negative information on Android forums before buying it for my son. Samsung really messed this one up. Just don't buy it, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Siskel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone much sooner than expected. I have had my phone for many months and have had no issues. For sure I will be purchasing from this seller again. Much better quality than expected for a used phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Kay

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: Considering I'm going from a basic flip phone that can text to a smartphone like this one, it's a huge improvement. Call quality is much better with this phone, and the picture quality is good too. There are 5 to 6 settings for pictures. It takes a little getting used to coming from a basic flip phone, but if you're willing to learn, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MQ3

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: It is a phone. I am happy with it. I had a blackbery years ago and for the past 3 1/2 years I have had a non smart phone. I was not a fan of Blackberries or I phones, so I chose the Galaxy. I am not disappointed at all. The only reason for the 4 stars is I don't "Love" any phone. I have had no issues with this phone so far.
customer_reviews.author: TNDUCKHUNTER

customer_reviews.title: fits nice in my pocket
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get rid of the old FLIP phone, fits nice in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: love love love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have one. My bf has one. My mom, sister, brother, brother-in-law, bff all have it. I started out with it and LOVE it. Never had phone that I've had absolutely NO problems with. No bugs, easy to use, tons of features, slim, great camera, nice battery life. Hands down the best phone I've ever had. Number two phone ever? Its predecessor, the s3. HIGHLY recommend this phone!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I loved the phone and it worked great for a used device. Cosmetically, it was in good condition with only a few minor blemishes that weren't really noticeable unless you were looking for them. However, I had to return the phone due to the volume button coming off. The refund process was fast and easy. I received the refund to my credit card the same day I shipped the device back.
customer_reviews.author: Prekteacher

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Phone on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great 16 pix camera. Many free apps work well with Droid software. I suggested this for my son and daughter-n-law. they made me aware of app to use phone as a Remote control for TV, And Direct TV box. It will display programs just like your direct TV will when searching for channels. But most of all It holds a signal and picks up signal quick when changing towers.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Loudermelk

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy off amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone from Amazon Warehouse deals. Seemed to work fine but it was an AT&T phone instead of Verizon. The description clearly said verizon. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Merida

customer_reviews.title: Poor wi-fi connectivity and poor reception/range for calls and texts.
customer_reviews.text: Phone has never had good Wi-Fi connection, has limited range for calls and texts, even though people with the same phone have good reception at the same locations. what's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I am supposed to treat this more like a tablet than a phone because of it's size. WIth the Otterbox it's huge but I love it. The sound quality is amazing through my car speakers and during phone calls. 4G is so fast where available. The only problems I have with the phone are the broken apps I have tried using in the app store.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Recieved defective product
customer_reviews.text: About one and a half months after receiving this phone, the charge port developed an internal short, and would rapidly disconnect and reconnect with the cable, as indicated by the frequent notification sounds given when the phone is plugged into a charger. This issue has deteriorated rapidly in just a week, leaving a soon to be useless device (if I can't charge it, I can't use it.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a fireman with huge hands. This phone feels solid in his hands. He was terribly afraid of dropping it since it feels rather slick, so we got him the Otterbox Defender. He loves the clear screen & the lack of little things he had to set up! Anyone could use this right out of the box he says!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann Beattie-Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Dirty/home button problems but it's Good
customer_reviews.text: Failed to connect to straight talk but that's straight talks fault other than that phone kinda dirty on arrival home button kinda smashed but pro e works perfect after some cleaning
customer_reviews.author: LeDerrius

customer_reviews.title: Great phone if don't have to have the latest and greatest!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one...I refuse to buy a phone costing more than a car payment 75% of a mortgage. I love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Not to mention the recommended case for the phone is Garbage because I dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: SO after charging me almost $200 for this phone. Its now 80? I bought this july 2nd. Not to mention the recommended case for the phone is Garbage because I dropped it for the first time yesterday and the screen shattered..Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Flutter Nut Squash

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: the phone came and worked as promised and the minor scratches were minor.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung galaxy S4 is an excellent phone. Best smart phone I have ever owed. Great features, fast, you can be on the phone and use apps and Internet at the same time. This phone rocks and puts iPhone to shame. Hands down better. You will not have any regrets buying this phone. Even pictures and videos it takes are really good. Best phone ever!
customer_reviews.author: Dean P

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast processor compared to the (Motorola Droid X) it replaced. My only complaint is the amount of "bloat ware" installed on the phone that consumes almost half of the phones internal 16G storage.
customer_reviews.author: rkw

customer_reviews.title: Just switched from iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I decided I needed to learn a little about the other side of the mobile phone world. This phone is crazy fast... a bit overkill. If you're an iPhone fan, and you don't like a lot of settings or ability to customize, then just stay with the iPhone. If you're ready to take things to the next level, go with the S4. After 1+ week of heavy use, no regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: DougDTX

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product; it is as advertised. I would recommend this for anyone looking for an item like this. The purchase was a smooth transaction and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Happy patron

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Phone Yet
customer_reviews.text: My last phone was a Motorola Droid and man this thing is a big step up. Tons more features, larger screen, crisp display, it's great. I previously owned an iPhone as well and I like this S4 much better. Good job Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung deal from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone and the deal was awesome. Does everything I want and more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter, she loves it!! Good quality for the price, works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas GG

customer_reviews.title: ... a year after I bought the phone it works great and doesn't break like the 6 iphones I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Even over a year after I bought the phone it works great and doesn't break like the 6 iphones I had before it. Each of those iphones had defects such as home button not working, power button not working, battery exploding while charging, ringer buttons falling off, etc. This S4 was built to last but after 1 year and a half almost the battery life is much worse which is normal for phone at this age.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, except bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Fast, fast, fast. Great video & camera! Love being able to turn off open apps/windows or toggling back to different apps/windows quickly. Have been streaming music and playing thru bluetooth to speakers. Bluetooth signal is the weakest of all phones owned in the past since bluetooth became available. Very disappointed w/ this feature. Need to have phone less than 10 feet away and not stand between phone & bluetooth device or even have your arm between. It is worse than my friends Galaxy s3. Only negative thing w/ phone since purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Pak

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with product & seller. Good experience overall.
customer_reviews.text: My S4 arrived ahead of schedule just as described. The only scratches were stricty cosmetic and on the side of the back cover (which was ultimately covered by my protective case anyway. All functions worked & calls are clear. I was transferring from an S4 with another provider to Verizon & the process was very quick & painless. Would recommend this seller & this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time and tried to be very careful ordering a cellphone on the internet. I briefly considered using Craigslist, but concluded that could be a nightmare. This site seemed to have the phone I needed to use on my Verizon plan. It arrived in just a couple of days and it took the guy at Verizion about 10 minutes to activate it and have it ready for me to use. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Meech

customer_reviews.title: I love my S4
customer_reviews.text: I love my S4. I am not sure I can add much to what has already been said about this great phone. I have not had any issues in the year and a half I have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace my phone when my contract expired. It works great. It could take a little better pictures and have a better zoom on the camera, action shots are hard to take.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McMeekan

customer_reviews.title: If it wasn't for all the bloatware on this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for all the bloatware on this thing I would give it a 5 star rating. I've also noticed that I am getting a weaker signal for the last month or so and I've had this for less than a year...
customer_reviews.author: D. Eggertsen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Verizon Samsung Galaxy S4 only to find out it's blacklisted. For those of you who do not know what that means, the phone has been listed as lost or stolen or the previous owner didn't pay their bill therefore the IMEI is pretty much locked up & can no longer be activated through Verizon. Luckily, that is a cheap fix & moderately easy process, but I would much rather have been able to pop in my sim & go about my day. 2 star rating from me!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone that is easy to use and has far to many features to mention. The size was a concern when I ordered it, but it is c So easy to view that I use it more and my PC less!
customer_reviews.author: Don Kendall

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the phone and the service
customer_reviews.text: The phone matched the product description, and the phone required of lying the standard set-up time. It arrived with all promised accessories and arrived very early in the shipping via window promised. I'm pleased with the phone and the service.
customer_reviews.author: kwrite81

customer_reviews.title: Phone started to shut off even though the battery was good and was charged
customer_reviews.text: screen was cracked in the upper right corner. Phone started to shut off even though the battery was good and was charged. I junked it and went to Verizon store and got another.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. It's not the latest version anymore
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. It's not the latest version anymore, but of course no phone is the "latest" version once you buy it. If you can find one of these cheap, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Some of the functions are not the same as the one that I broke- supposed to be the exact same phone. But, overall, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Too Tall Kel

customer_reviews.title: cant go wrong with an android.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Bought it through amazon because it was cheaper then my cell provider. I have had it a yeat and a half and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gorbutt

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I have had many android phones and just got rid of the Apple I Phone 5 never will have another Iphone , the S-4 is an unbelivable phone , so many features on this phone i could spend an hour writing the things this phone does , but i am not going to , its just an incredible phone thats all i can say
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B Hashinger

customer_reviews.title: S4 scores
customer_reviews.text: My son just had to have the larger screen over his S3 so this does everything the way the S3 did, yet it is a little weak on the WiFi reception when he was in the hospital for a two night stay.
customer_reviews.author: James Becker

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old S4 because I couldn't plug in the charger. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: phone was in get shape could not even tell it was used. received it well before the promised date. exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Super fast and intuitive. Easy to use with the latest/greatest features on the market. I've been a Samsung fan since I switched for Apple products. I would never go back. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: Bad phone
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with charger or instructions manual. Will not stay charged. Gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Christie L Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: Best phone i ever had. Have a Galaxy S2 for 2 years. S4 is 4 times faster, and little taller. update. had phone a week and a half. works every where all the time. better antena? battery lasts 2 days easy. s2 needed charge 2 times aday. have no complaints so far. does everything but laundry.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES HOFACKER

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s4
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Just love the size. Very easy to set up. Arrived in better condition than I expected and came very fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lehoullier

customer_reviews.title: Love my Galaxy S
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone and have really enjoyed it. It meets all my expectations.I would recommend this phone to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ronda St George

customer_reviews.title: It looked excellent. However
customer_reviews.text: It looked excellent. However , I HAVE ISSUES WITH SPEAKER FUNCTION. No one can hear me when I am using this feature. The number disappear from the filing screen and all I have is dashes. I am sure who ever sold it knew of the peoblem. I sent email to seller never got back to me. It's n I t the Galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: alina

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Used it now for over two years without a problem. I'm glad it has a removable and replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery was completely dead, I had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrin Alaei

customer_reviews.title: I still love it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this phone! It did freeze up on me however, in the middle of a browsing session. The screen kept flickering off and on until it finally went black. I had to take the battery out to reset it. I didn't expect that to happen seeing as though I've only had the phone for a month...but other than that one snafu, it's really a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: Samsung, I love this phone. So far no problems whatsoever. Significant improvements from Galaxy 2. Love the size, the weight, everything
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: The battery was inflated and verizon would not service the ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery was inflated and verizon would not service the phone because they said that this battery could blow up. I have to buy a new battery
customer_reviews.author: HASSan Abou Ghayda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working like a charm and i had it for almost 2yrs now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have owned
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY GALAXY S4. I would buy another without even looking at any other types.
customer_reviews.author: C M Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: very nice phone, they got it to me in a nice quick time and works very well. Looks like it is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Nettrouer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great features, speed and awesome phone. Verizon coverage is good. Add an S-View flip cover and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Received the phone yesterday worked good and now it won't hold a charge at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone yesterday worked good and now it won't hold a charge at all It won't even charge the charging icon comes on but the percentage keeps going down
customer_reviews.author: Arden E.

customer_reviews.title: was great help in providing me with details
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade over the phone I replaced. The person I purchased it from, alliet89, was great help in providing me with details.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I want and more than I will ever use. Glad I bought it as my first smartphone!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very scared I was gunna get a phone that was horribly scratched and damaged bad, but honestly I swer to you it looked brand new and I couldn't have been more excited.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, and she really likes the size, screen, and the operating system. She learning something new all the time
customer_reviews.author: cdkb1977

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Really love my Samsung Galaxy S4! It has many features but not hard to operate. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: cell phone never turned on and touch screen was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Luz C.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: I love everything aboiut this phone! It has amazing HD clarity with tons of extras like remote control of tvs and other devices, eye control of screens, air scrolling, and touch syncing with other S4s for photo sharing. I struggled with the decision to switch from my Droid but so glad that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredia Collins_Holmes

customer_reviews.title: waste of money that I could had used for something ...
customer_reviews.text: came in with a broken charging port... waste of money that I could had used for something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Phone, Phenomenal Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 16gb version of the Samsung Galaxy S4. This entire line of devices is pretty good at earning positive reviews. Purchasing brand new through Amazon cost me $200 less than purchasing direct from my cell phone service provider. I'd give 6 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Muhleck

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No issues, first smart phone, works as advertised. I would definately buy again. Could do without the bloat ware, but not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: LN.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone that I love and it arrived very quick. No problems and would buy more from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy1119

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have owned them all. This phone is a game changer. Sleek, top-of-the-line tech, good battery life. The only thing missing is perhaps a little more robust shell. This phone is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: John G. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: right on point description was just like it said it was very fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically new !!
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone today and it looks great. It has a lil stratch on the screen but you can not notice it that much. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I love it, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the phone and the sim card included is great. There is really nothing more I could say! It does everything that I want and more. I'm still getting used to the features and learning what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae McCray

customer_reviews.title: came super fast. even before expected arrival
customer_reviews.text: no glitches or anything. the charger doesn't work otherwise i'd leave 5 stars. came super fast. even before expected arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Delnicki

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a LG optimus G pro in August 2013 and it was terrible - so happy to have a Samsung again
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I haven't found a thing that I dislike. Still discovering all the new features. Best phone I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L Rebert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got what I wanted. It is exactly as described. Nothing broken in shipping. All is perfect. Got to me way before the earliest predicted date. Great vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Gehman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great phone. I love using it and would recommend it to anyone. The camera is great
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like my phone and u am glad that it came with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I dreamed
customer_reviews.text: Used it now for only a few weeks but it is awesome. Great speed, screen resolution is terrific, battery life is better than I expected. I would definitely recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: MamaW

customer_reviews.title: It gets hot easily. I never had problems like this with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone shutdown for no reason at all. It gets hot easily . I never had problems like this with my other Galaxy S4.
customer_reviews.author: MekaMae

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fine Until It Suddenly Died
customer_reviews.text: This phone replaced my 3 year old iPhone 4. It was a decent replacement but it had several bugs (camera failures, frozen apps) that gave me cause for concern. After only 4 months of use it suddenly stopped working for no obvious reason (the battery was at 91%, it wasn't dropped, damaged or used on unsafe websites or apps). I was using the browser (Google News page) when the screen went black. That was 3 days ago and the phone hasn't responded to any attempt to bring it back to life. Unfortunately I can't return it through Amazon, so I'm back to using my 3 year old iPhone 4. Should have stayed with Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful device. More than met my expectations and I use it more than I imagined. Nice to have another alternative to stationary computer.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my husband for Christmas. We both have an Iphone 4S, and he is in love with this new Samsung. I'm quite jealous, I should have bought myself one!

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S4, Black Mist 16GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description: The design of the Samsung Galaxy S4 defies what's possible. The incredibly-wide Full HD Super AMOLED screen fits perfectly within an extraordinarily *NEW_LINE*slim bezel that's encased in a special polycarbonate body, making this the *NEW_LINE*lightest and most sophisticated Galaxy yet. *SIM Card not included
feature_bullets: 5.0-inch Super AMOLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1080 x 1920 pixel resolution with Corning Gorilla Glass 3
13MP Camera with f/2.2, 31mm, LED flash, 1/3-inch sensor size, 1.14 pixel size & 2MP Front Camera with f/2.4, 31mm, 1080p@30fps
Internal Memory: 16GB, 2GB RAM - microSD up to 64GB
WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot; Bluetooth: v4.0, A2DP, EDR, LE, aptX; GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS; USB: microUSB v2.0 (MHL 2 TV-out), USB Host
